divs: Sighting DetailsWhile driving an ambulance down Hwy 401 South between Garner and Fuquay Varina, NC (Raleigh address) saw a triangle shaped object flying at aprox 1000 feet. Very low to ground making no noise. No markings noted. Object did have red light at back left corner and a white light noted to the back right corner with no tail noted (looking up from ground). Was able to pull ahead of trees and noted object a high rate of speed over trees in distance and disapeared. This was witnessed by two paramedics. Never seen anything like this before.
Summary: Triangle shaped object with 2 lights flew over us very low and high rate of speed
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Garner
There were no other sightings in Garner on or around March 27th 2008
